title: Military Strategy OST
description: 10 Original tracks, 20 files, orchestral RTS music pack.
longDescription:
Link to the demos!


Military Strategy OST is an epic sounding, orchestral RTS music pack. It was written for the battle/action gameplay, main themes, menu screens, game results screens and general gameplay. 

It features powerful orchestral music compositions, with different levels of intensity, written for string section, brass section, percussion section and big drum ensemble; that will help immerse players right into the game.


It includes 10 tracks, each with a loop edit for convenience: 

All tracks are .wav, 44.1kHz, 16 bits


Battle Casualties (2:16)

Battle Casualties - Loop (2:02)

Battle Insight (2:21)

Battle Insight - Loop (2:08)

Dangerous Move (2:04)

Dangerous Move - Loop (1:52)

Engage in Battle (2:19)

Engage in Battle - Loop (2:08)

March to Battle - Loop (2:24)

Preparing for War - Loop (1:55)

Preparing the Armies (2:09)

Preparing the Armies - Loop (2:02)

Strategic Battle (2:10)

Strategic Battle - Loop (2:05)

Strategic Move (2:35)

Strategic Move - Loop (2:24)

The Cost of War (2:15)

The Cost of War - Loop (2:06)
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  10 Original high quality tracks
  •  10 Loop edits

Number of Audio Wavs: 20

Number of Audio Cues: 20

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1kHz / 16 bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 44:00 (including loop versions)

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
